T02D1534:95b-0: @95b ` // lam gyi rab tu bya ba bzhugs so /
T02D1534:96a-0: // / @96a # // dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1534:96a-1: bsnyen pa'i cho ga dang sta gon gyi cho ga dang dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o //
T02D1534:96a-2: bsnyen pa la dang po skabs dbye ba ni /
T02D1534:96a-4: shes rab dang ldan pas mandala byas te /
T02D1534:96a-5: phyag gsum byas la me tog gsum dbul /
T02D1534:96a-6: pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar bas //
T02D1534:96a-7: slob dpon gyis bdag la bde mchog 'khor lo mngon
T02D1534:96a-8: par 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal por dbang bskur
T02D1534:96a-9: ba stsal du gsol zhes lan gsum zhu /
T02D1534:96a-10: 'o na bdag gis bsnyen pa bya'i /
T02D1534:96a-11: khyod kyis rdzas sogs shig ces gnang ba byin la /
T02D1534:96a-12: khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyol ba'i sngags bzlas pa'i sngags
T02D1534:96a-13: su byin la srod tho rangs brgya rtsa blos su
T02D1534:96a-14: gzhug go // de nas bdag nyid l'u yi ba'i rnal 'byor ram /
T02D1534:96a-15: dpa' bo gcig pa bsgom pa'am /
T02D1534:96a-16: mngal skyes kyi yang rung bas rdo rje dang do li yi bzlas pa bya /
T02D1534:96a-17: thun bzhi'i rnal 'byor gyis spyir rtsa sngags 'bum phrag gcig gam /
T02D1534:96a-18: yang na yab yum gyi snying po'am nye snying gang yang rung ba 'bum //
T02D1534:96a-19: 'khor gyi lha la khri khri sumbha ni 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pa ni grangs kyi bsnyen pa'o //
T02D1534:96a-20: yang na mtshan ma'i bsnyen pa rmi lam du lhas
T02D1534:96a-21: dbang bskur la reg ces gnang ba 'am brdas kyang
T02D1534:96a-22: rung ngo // dbang med na bzlas pa dum gcig byas la /
T02D1534:96a-23: yid kyis lha mngon du dmigs te gnang bar bsams la byar rung ba ni bdag po'i bkas so //
T02D1534:96a-24: de'i tshe mchod pa lnga dang gtor ma re ma chags par gtang bar bya'o //
T02D1534:96a-25: de nas bskul ba'i phyir slob mas mandala sngon du 'gro bas snga ma ltar zhu ba yang bya'o //
T02D1534:96a-26: rdzas tshogs sam ma tshogs zhes dri'o //
T02D1534:96a-27: kha cig ni tshogs la kha cig ni ma tshogs zhes zhu'o //
T02D1534:96a-28: de nas sdig pa bsal ba dang bsrung bar bya ba ni /
T02D1534:96a-29: slob ma'i lte bar nyi ma la h'um sngon po
T02D1534:96a-30: bsams la yang de'i snying gar sdig pa kam nag
T02D1534:96a-31: po las sha za'i gzugs rid pa rkang lag phra
T02D1534:96a-32: ba / skra gyen du brdzes pa bsams la h'um
T02D1534:96a-33: gi 'od kyis gyen du phul te sna bug g-yas
T02D1534:96a-35: h'um de sgo mtshams kyi lha mo brgyad du gyur nas /
T02D1534:96b-0: de rnams kyis @96b gri gug gis bgos nas zos te /
T02D1534:96b-1: yang h'um du song nas sna bug de nyid nas slar thim par bsam /
T02D1534:96b-2: srung ba ni lag pa g-yon par ha byas pas /
T02D1534:96b-3: rdo rje rgya gram bsams la de slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag pas lus rdo rjer song bar bsam /
T02D1534:96b-4: sumbha ni brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa rdo rje rgya gram yang de'i spyi bor gnas par bsam /
T02D1534:96b-5: de nas de dag skad cig mas phyag gnyis pa'i
T02D1534:96b-6: he ru kar bsams la mchod pa dang gtor ma
T02D1534:96b-8: mdun du slob ma'i gtso bo la sogs pas mandala
T02D1534:96b-9: byed pa sngon du 'gro bas phyag byed du bcug
T02D1534:96b-10: la thal mo bskyed par bya ste /
T02D1534:96b-11: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi //
T02D1534:96b-12: sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags //
T02D1534:96b-13: 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang //
T02D1534:96b-14: sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung //
T02D1534:96b-15: byang chub mchog gi sems ni bdag gis bskyed /
T02D1534:96b-16: sems can thams cad bdag gis mgron du gnyer //
T02D1534:96b-17: byang chub spyod mchog yid 'ong spyad pa yis //
T02D1534:96b-18: 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog / ces lan gsum brjod do //
T02D1534:96b-21: spyi bor dri'i thig le gsum byas la rdo rje
T02D1534:96b-22: reg pa sngon du 'gro bas h'um a'a: aom zhes
T02D1534:96b-23: brjod cing rim pa bzhin du padma dang /
T02D1534:96b-24: 'khor lo dag la yi ge gsum po de nyid
T02D1534:96b-25: rim pa bzhin du mtshan pa 'og ma gnyis nyi
T02D1534:96b-26: ma la 'khor lo zla ba la bsam par bya'o
T02D1534:96b-27: // de nas aom pu dz'a ao aa zhes bya
T02D1534:96b-28: ba la sogs pa brjod pas yul nyer bzhir lag
T02D1534:96b-29: pa g-yon pa'i srin lag gis reg bzhin du yul
T02D1534:96b-30: // de dang / de'i gnas rnams su mos par bya'o //
T02D1534:96b-31: de nas skyes pa la ni snying ga la sogs
T02D1534:96b-32: par aom hal sogs pa bsam zhing bud med la
T02D1534:96b-33: ni lte ba la sogs par aom bam la sogs
T02D1534:96b-34: pas byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D1534:96b-35: de nas de dag la mchod pa bya ste /
T02D1534:96b-40: zhal zas ni zhal du dmigs te'o //
T02D1534:96b-41: de yang aom a'a: badzra pushpe h'um zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
T02D1534:96b-42: de nas tshems shing dor bar bya ste /
T02D1534:96b-43: mdun du ba lang gi ko ba tsam du sa
T02D1534:96b-44: gzhi ba'i lci ba sar pas byugs la padma 'dab
T02D1534:97a-1: bzhi'i nang du chud pa bris pa la me tog gi tshom bu dgu bkod nas /
T02D1534:97a-2: der slob ma shar ram byang du kha blta bas tshems shing ma yo ma gas pa /
T02D1534:97a-3: lo 'dab kyis kha brgyan pa can tsandan gyis byugs pa la /
T02D1534:97a-4: me tog gi phred pa bcings la /
T02D1534:97a-5: aom badzra da na da kshtha bi ma la bi shuddhe sv'a h'a /
T02D1534:97a-7: cho ga bzhin du bcas nas thal mo'i bar nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dor du gzhug go //
T02D1534:97a-8: 'dir tshems shing gi mtshan ma brtag par bya ste /
T02D1534:97a-9: shar du bltas na zhi ba'i dngos grub po //
T02D1534:97a-10: byang du bltas na rgyas pa'o //
T02D1534:97a-11: nub tu bltas na dbang ngo //
T02D1534:97a-12: lhor bltas na mngon spyod do //
T02D1534:97a-13: gyen du bltas na rig pa 'dzin pa lha'i dngos grub bo //
T02D1534:97a-14: thur du bltas na 'og gi dngos grub bo //
T02D1534:97a-15: dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du song na dngos grub med do zhes brtag par bya'o //
T02D1534:97a-16: de nas ngag dag ba'i don du bdud rtsi lnga
T02D1534:97a-17: dang sbyar ba'i dri'i chu la 'khor lo kun gyi
T02D1534:97a-19: de nas aom hr'i: bi shuddha dharm'a: sarba p'a pam
T02D1534:97a-20: ni tsa a'a s+y'a bi sho dha ya sarba bi
T02D1534:97a-21: kalpa aa pa na ya h'um zhes brjod pas //
T02D1534:97a-22: lag pa g-yon pa'i khyor bar lan gsum blud par bya'o //
T02D1534:97a-23: de nas yi ge nyer gnyis pa'i sngags lan gsum
T02D1534:97a-24: bzlas pa'i ku sha sngas dang stan gyi phyir byin
T02D1534:97a-25: la / rang rang gi mi gang dang lag tshad
T02D1534:97a-26: kyi skud pa sum sgril byas la gsum pa gsum
T02D1534:97a-28: snying po'i sngags lan bdun bzlas la dpung par bcing bar bya'o //
T02D1534:97a-29: de nas chos bshad pas spro ba skyed par bya ste ;
T02D1534:97a-30: 'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen rnams //
T02D1534:97a-31: au dumw'a ra'i me tog bzhin //
T02D1534:97a-32: brgya lam na yang res 'ga' zhig /'byung 'gyur yang ni mi 'byung ngo //
T02D1534:97a-33: gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'byung bzhin //
T02D1534:97a-34: de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste //
T02D1534:97a-35: gang gis mtshungs med sems can don //
T02D1534:97a-36: mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus //
T02D1534:97a-37: bskal pa bye ba du mar ni //
T02D1534:97a-38: sngon chad sdig pa gang byas pa //
T02D1534:97a-40: mthong bas kyang de byang 'gyur na //
T02D1534:97a-41: grags pa mtha' yas gsang sngags kyi //
T02D1534:97a-42: tshul la spyod pa smos ci dgos //
T02D1534:97b-0: skyob pa'i gsang sngags @97b bzlas na ni //
T02D1534:97b-2: gang dag spyod pa mchog 'di la //
T02D1534:97b-3: blo gros shin tu dri med pa //
T02D1534:97b-4: de dag gis ni ngan 'gro'i rgyun //
T02D1534:97b-5: sdug bsngal kun 'byung rab tu bcad //
T02D1534:97b-6: gang gis khyed rnams sras bcas pa'i //
T02D1534:97b-7: rgyal ba rnams kyis bstan 'di la //
T02D1534:97b-8: bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis //
T02D1534:97b-9: rnyed pa mnyam med de ring rnyed //
T02D1534:97b-10: theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba'i //
T02D1534:97b-11: lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan //
T02D1534:97b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su 'gyur //
T02D1534:97b-14: zhes bya ba dag gis dam pa'i chos bsgrags pa byas nas /
T02D1534:97b-15: sumbha nis srung ba byas te /
T02D1534:97b-16: tho rangs kyi rmi lam ci mthong ba kho bo la bos shig byas nas //
T02D1534:97b-17: dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi'i mthar sed ge'i nyal thabs kyis nyal du gzhug go //
T02D1534:97b-18: slob dpon dkyil 'khor gyi khang par zhugs te /
T02D1534:97b-19: bsrung ba'i don du sumbha ni bzlas par bya'o zhes
T02D1534:97b-20: bya ba ni slob ma sta gon du gnas pa'i
T02D1534:97b-22: / de nas bum pa sta gon du gnas pa brjod par bya ste /
T02D1534:97b-23: re zhig bum pa bcu 'am drug gam gnyis sam gcig kyang rung ste /
T02D1534:97b-24: rtsa ba dad nag po la sogs pa'i skyon med pa /
T02D1534:97b-25: gser ram dngul lam kham pa la sogs pa'i rgyu las byas pa /
T02D1534:97b-26: kha dog dkar por bsgyur ba rigs kyi mtshan mas mtshan pa /
T02D1534:97b-27: 'o ma can gyi shing gis kha brgyan pa /
T02D1534:97b-28: rigs kyi sku mdog mthun pa'i gos kyis mgul pa dkris pa /
T02D1534:97b-29: bsti gnas kyi chu 'o ma can gyis bkang ba /
T02D1534:97b-32: hu lu ka ste dri lnga dang bcas pa /
T02D1534:97b-33: bdung rtsi lnga dang rin po che lnga dang /
T02D1534:97b-34: 'bru lnga dang sman lngas gang ba'i snod steng du bzhag ste /
T02D1534:97b-35: 'og tu padma'i gdan steng du gdugs phub la /
T02D1534:97b-37: sangs rgyas kun gyi mkha' 'gro ma //
T02D1534:97b-38: re re bzlas te bzhag la lhag par gnas par bya'o //
T02D1534:97b-39: ra zhig bum pa bcu'i lugs la ni /
T02D1534:97b-40: rnam par rgyal ba la gcig //
T02D1534:97b-41: padma'i snod bzhi dang bcas pa'i yum bzhi la re re /
T02D1534:97b-42: thugs dang gsung sku dang dam tshig gi 'khor lo rnams la re re ste de ltar na dgu'o //
T02D1534:98a-0: @98a * // las thams cad pa dang bcu'o //
T02D1534:98a-1: drug gi lugs la 'khor lo lnga la re re rnam par rgyal ba dang drug go //
T02D1534:98a-2: las thams cad pa dam tshig gi 'khor lor bsdu'i //
T02D1534:98a-3: gnyis pa ni thabs dang shes rab kyi dbye bas so //
T02D1534:98a-4: las thams cad pa ni gtso bo la bsdu'o //
T02D1534:98a-5: gcig gi lugs la ni dkyil 'khor gyi lha ma
T02D1534:98a-6: lus pa gcig tu bsdu zhing las thams cad pa
T02D1534:98a-8: de ni khyim pa dbang bskur ba la yin gyi /
T02D1534:98a-9: dge tshul yan chad la ma yin no //
T02D1534:98a-10: gcig gis ma yin par rgyud las bkag pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1534:98a-11: rtsa ba ni dbyibs kyi skyon no //
T02D1534:98a-12: nag po ni kha dog gi skyon te de dag med pa'o //
T02D1534:98a-13: tshad kyang mchur sor nyer gcig / zheng du bcu drug gce'u med pa'o //
T02D1534:98a-14: mgrin pa la sor drug go //
T02D1534:98a-16: mgrin pa'i sbubs la sor gnyis so //
T02D1534:98a-17: mngon spyod la sogs pa'i phrin las gzhan la ni tshad gzhan dang gzhan du brjod do //
T02D1534:98a-18: dkar por bsgyur ba ni rang bzhin gyis kha dog dkar po med pa la'o //
T02D1534:98a-19: rigs kyi mtshan ma rnam par rgyal ba la ni
T02D1534:98a-20: chos 'byung gi dbus su sna tshogs padma'i lte bar
T02D1534:98a-21: ka p'a la'i nang du chud pa'i rdo rje dang
T02D1534:98a-23: rigs kyi yum bzhi la ni gri gug dang ka p'a la'o //
T02D1534:98a-24: thugs kyi 'khor lo la rdo rje dang gri gug go //
T02D1534:98a-25: gsung gi 'khor lo la padma dang gri gug go //
T02D1534:98a-26: sku'i 'khor lo la 'khor lo dang gri gug go //
T02D1534:98a-27: dam tshig gi 'khor lo la ka p'a la dang gri gug go //
T02D1534:98a-28: las thams cad pa la ni sna tshogs rdo rje dang gri gug go //
T02D1534:98a-29: 'o ma can gyi shing ni tsu ta la sogs pa'o //
T02D1534:98a-30: rin po che sna lnga ni gser dang dngul dang mu med dang mu tig dang byi ru'o //
T02D1534:98a-31: nas dang gro dang til dang 'bras so ba dang /
T02D1534:98a-35: aa pa r'a dzi ta dang /
T02D1534:98a-37: ha sa de ba ste sman lnga'o //
T02D1534:98a-38: padma dang gdugs ni shog bu las byas pa'o //
T02D1534:98a-39: dkyil 'khor ni ser po 'ba' zhig las byas pa'o //
T02D1534:98a-40: de yang lha dang phyag mtshan med pa'i gdan gzhal yas khang pa'i rnam pa 'ba' zhig bri'o //
T02D1534:98b-0: gal te nus pa med na @98b sngar gyi tshems
T02D1534:98b-1: shing dor ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa lta bu
T02D1534:98b-2: bya'o // de nas bum pa lhag par gnas pa bya ste /
T02D1534:98b-3: me tog la sogs pa mchod pa'i yo byad sna tshogs dang /
T02D1534:98b-4: gtor ma rnams sta gon byas nas /
T02D1534:98b-5: slob dpon bdag nyid ting nge 'dzin rdzogs par bsgoms la dkyil 'khor nye bar bsdus te /
T02D1534:98b-6: phyag gnyis pa'i ting 'dzin gyis gnas par bya'o //
T02D1534:98b-7: de nas skad cig mas rnam par rgyal ba'i bum
T02D1534:98b-8: par ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo rdzogs par bsam
T02D1534:98b-9: mo // rigs kyi yum bzhi la ni yum re dang ka p'a la re re'o //
T02D1534:98b-10: thugs dang gsung dang sku dang dam tshig gi 'khor lo'o //
T02D1534:98b-11: de nas 'bar ba'i sngags dang phyag rgyas rnam pa
T02D1534:98b-12: thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor
T02D1534:98b-13: lo mdun du spyan drangs te bum pa'i lha rnams
T02D1534:98b-14: la bstim mo // de dag ma lus par zhu
T02D1534:98b-15: ba las ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i chus gang bar
T02D1534:98b-16: la bstim mo // bsam mo // de nas bum
T02D1534:98b-17: pa'i gnas lnga dag tu rdo rje'i phyag rgyas reg
T02D1534:98b-18: la bstim mo // bsam mo // cing / aom
T02D1534:98b-19: badzra padma aa mri ta su bi shuddha dharma dh'a
T02D1534:98b-20: tu sv'a bh'a ba sarba dharm'a na su bi shuddha
T02D1534:98b-21: dharma dh'a tu sarba na ku ru ku ru sv'a
T02D1534:98b-22: la bstim mo // bsam mo // cing / h'a / zhes lan gsum brjod par bya'o //
T02D1534:98b-23: de nas me tog gi phreng ba dang 'brel ba'i
T02D1534:98b-24: rdo rje bum pa'i steng du bzhag ste lag pa
T02D1534:98b-25: g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis bzung ste /
T02D1534:98b-26: lag pa g-yas pas bgrang phreng snying gar bzung nas 'khor lo'i gtso bo la ni brgya bzlas shing /
T02D1534:98b-27: 'khor gyi lha rnams la ni nyer gcig bzla'o //
T02D1534:98b-28: las thams cad pa la ni sumbha ni brgya rtsa
T02D1534:98b-29: brgyad bzlas nas phyi'i mchod pa lnga dang yid las
T02D1534:98b-30: byung ba'i lha mo bcu drug dang /
T02D1534:98b-31: rin po che sna bdun gyis kyang mchod de spos
T02D1534:98b-32: snod dang rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa'i lag pas
T02D1534:98b-33: / dpal ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma //
T02D1534:98b-35: sku gsum ye shes lnga dang ldan //
T02D1534:98b-37: ji snyed rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma //
T02D1534:98b-38: rtog pa'i 'ching ba gcod mdzad cing //
T02D1534:98b-40: de snyad pa la rtag phyag 'tshal //
T02D1534:98b-42: yi ge brgya pa brjod de /
T02D1534:98b-43: gtor ma byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D1534:99a-1: bo'i dga' ston dang tshogs kyi 'khor lo byin gyis
T02D1534:99a-2: brlab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bum pa lhag
T02D1534:99a-5: // / de nas rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor ni /
T02D1534:99a-6: dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya zhing ras ris la ni dkyil 'khor mngon du dmigs te /
T02D1534:99a-7: bdag 'jug byas nas slob ma la dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D1534:99a-8: de la phyogs bzhir slob dpon bzhi 'am bdag gcig pu yang rung ste /
T02D1534:99a-9: bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa'i dri chus khrus byas nas /
T02D1534:99a-10: gos dang phyag rgya lnga la sogs pa'i rgyan gyi chas su zhugs la /
T02D1534:99a-11: dkyil 'khor gyi lho phyogs nas kha byang du bltas te /
T02D1534:99a-12: stan mthon po la 'dug par bya'o //
T02D1534:99a-13: de nas yang snga ma ltar ting nge 'dzin rdzogs par bsgoms te /
T02D1534:99a-14: phyag gnyis pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas go rims bzhin du dbang bdun dang /
T02D1534:99a-16: bzhi pa'i mthar thug pa rnams dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo las blang bar bya'o //
T02D1534:99a-19: // / de nas slob ma gzhug pa ni /
T02D1534:99a-20: yol ba'i phyi rol du mandala byed du bcug la phyag byas te /
T02D1534:99a-21: me tog snyim par bzung nas gnas pa la /
T02D1534:99a-22: slob dpon gyis nang nas bka' bsdam mo zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D1534:99a-23: bde chen bdag ni skal ba bzang //
T02D1534:99a-24: zhes bya ba ni slob ma'i lan no //
T02D1534:99a-26: dgos pa ci'i phyir 'jug / phyag rgya chen po'i
T02D1534:99a-27: dngos grub kyi phyir ro zhes slob ma'i lan no
T02D1534:99a-28: // de nas dung chos spyi bor bzhag ste /
T02D1534:99a-29: khyor bar chu lan gsum blud la /
T02D1534:99a-30: sumbha ni bzlas pa'i ku sha'i chus bsang ba bya'o //
T02D1534:99a-31: de nas dbab pa'i cho ga bya ste /
T02D1534:99a-32: mtshal chen bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas //
T02D1534:99a-33: dur khrod ras la byugs nas ni //
T02D1534:99a-34: bsdus pa'i phye ma cha gcig dang //
T02D1534:99a-35: byi la nag po'i bshad ba ni //
T02D1534:99a-36: de mnyam cha ni gcig tu bya //
T02D1534:99a-37: de mnyam gu gul nag por spyad //
T02D1534:99a-38: dur khrod sol ba blangs nas ni //
T02D1534:99a-39: mchod yon snod du bdug pa sbyar //
T02D1534:99a-40: sku yi dkyil 'khor rdzogs par ni //
T02D1534:99a-41: slob ma'i lus la rab bkod de //
T02D1534:99a-42: de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis //
T02D1534:99a-43: dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs //
T02D1534:99b-1: slob ma'i lag nas bzung nas ni //
T02D1534:99b-2: sangs rgyas kun gyi mkha' 'gro ma //
T02D1534:99b-3: rtse gcig sems kyis bzlas par bya //
T02D1534:99b-4: de la sku babs na ni 'phar ba la sogs pa lus kyi rdzu 'phrul 'byung ngo //
T02D1534:99b-5: gsung babs na ni dbang pos mi sod pa'i don rnams smra bar 'gyur ro ;
T02D1534:99b-6: / thugs babs na ni mngon par shes pa lnga la sogs pa'i yon tan 'byung ngo //
T02D1534:99b-7: ye shes babs na ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas par 'gyur ro //
T02D1534:99b-8: de nas dbab pa bsdus la /
T02D1534:99b-9: lag pa spyi bor bzhag ste /
T02D1534:99b-10: snying po'i sngags de nyid lan bdun bzlas pas srung ba bya'o //
T02D1534:99b-11: de nas go bskon par bya'o //
T02D1534:99b-12: de nas sumbha ni bzlas pa'i chus bsangs pa'i sna
T02D1534:99b-13: tshogs pa'i mdog gam kha dog ser po'i dar ras
T02D1534:99b-14: kyis gdong g-yogs bcings la stod g-yogs dang smad g-yogs
T02D1534:99b-15: kyang sbyin no // de la gdong g-yogs bcing ba'i sngags ni /
T02D1534:99b-16: aom dva da sha aam ga ni ro dha ka ri ni h'um phat /
T02D1534:99b-17: de nas brtul zhugs dbog par bya ste /
T02D1534:99b-18: 'gro ba bgrod pa rnams kyis brtul zhugs sbyin bya de dag ni //
T02D1534:99b-19: srog gcod mi bden gzhan nor gzhan gyi chung ma de bzhin chang gi btung ba spang //
T02D1534:99b-20: 'khor ba rdo rje zhags pas rang gi dge ba 'joms byed sdig pa lnga po 'di dag yin //
T02D1534:99b-21: gang dag gang gi dus byung sum cu mi yi
T02D1534:99b-22: bla ma de yi mtshan gyis rab tu sbyin bya
T02D1534:99b-23: ste / sna tshogs gtso bo srid pa'i 'jigs pa
T02D1534:99b-24: 'joms mdzad bka' 'di khyod kyis kyang ni bskyang bar
T02D1534:99b-25: ste / bya / cho lo kha na ma tho'i
T02D1534:99b-26: zas dang brjod ngan 'byung po lha min dbang po'i
T02D1534:99b-27: ste / bya / chos // ba lang bud med
T02D1534:99b-28: skyes rnams de bcu mi yi bla ma lnga po
T02D1534:99b-30: snying grogs la 'khu rje dpon de bzhin sum cu mi yi bla ma yid ches dge 'dun la'ang //
T02D1534:99b-31: dbang po rnams kyi chags pa zhes byas mi yi bdag po'i brtul zhugs nyi shu rtsa lnga yis //
T02D1534:99b-32: de ltar brtul zhugs phog nas /
T02D1534:99b-33: de nyid gsum lan bdun bzlas pa'i me tog gcig
T02D1534:99b-34: lag pa'i padma'i dbus su gtang ba shr'i he ru
T02D1534:99b-35: ka ya bid ma he bidy'a r'a dz'a ya dhi
T02D1534:99b-37: zhes bya bas nang du gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1534:100a-0: de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis @100a * //
T02D1534:100a-2: las kyi rdo rje phyi bzhin 'brang bas dkyil 'khor lan gsum bskor ba byas te /
T02D1534:100a-3: dang por rigs nges par bya ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor gyi shar sgo nas /
T02D1534:100a-4: slob dpon gyis bden pa bdar ba sngon du song bas me tog 'dor du gzhug go /
T02D1534:100a-5: de la bden ba bdar ba'i tshig ni /
T02D1534:100a-6: don dam smra ba'i seng ge rnal 'byor zhes bya ba //
T02D1534:100a-7: srid pa'i nyon mongs gcod pa'i don la shin tu mkhas gyur pa //
T02D1534:100a-8: srid pa'i nyes brgyas bskyod pa'i nyon mongs choms mdzod la //
T02D1534:100a-9: rnal 'byor don dam rgyal po'i de nyid grub par mdzad du gsol //
T02D1534:100a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
T02D1534:100a-11: he ru ka dpal grong khyer mchog / snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di ru ni //
T02D1534:100a-12: bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bgyi //
T02D1534:100a-13: 'di yi dngos grub cir gyur dang //
T02D1534:100a-14: rigs gang la ni skal ldan dang //
T02D1534:100a-15: bsod nams ci 'dra las byung ba //
T02D1534:100a-16: de 'dra dkyil 'khor 'di ru shog / aom sarba
T02D1534:100a-17: ta th'a ga ta ku la bi shodha ni sv'a
T02D1534:100a-18: h'a / zhes brjod la h'um zhes brjod pas /
T02D1534:100a-19: lag pa'i bar nas skyil 'khor gyi dbus su me tog 'dor du gzhug go //
T02D1534:100a-20: de nas aom de bee durya audgha ta ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1534:100a-21: zhes bya bas gdong g-yogs bkrol la /
T02D1534:100a-22: dkyil 'khor dang lha'i de nyid dang me tog lhung ba'i gnas dang rigs rnams bstan par bya'o //
T02D1534:100a-23: de nas de bzhin du bskor bas byang phyogs kyi sgor khyer te /
T02D1534:100a-24: bum pa gzhan gyi dung chos las rnam par rgyal
T02D1534:100a-25: ba'i dung chos su me tog 'dor du gzhug go
T02D1534:100a-26: // nyung zad blugs la lag pa g-yon pa'i mtho
T02D1534:100a-27: bo dang srin lag gis skye ba'i gnas lnga dag
T02D1534:100a-28: tu dung chos kyi chus sngags 'di dag gis bsangs
T02D1534:100a-29: // la // de nas ku sha'i chus khams lnga
T02D1534:100a-30: dag par bya ba'i phyir lan gsum du chu'i dbang
T02D1534:100a-31: // la // bskur bar bya'o // de la sngags
T02D1534:100a-32: ni aom a'a a'i r'i a'u l'i panytsa skan dha
T02D1534:100a-33: bi sho dha ni sv'a h'a /
T02D1534:100a-34: de nas sngar bzhin gnas lnga dag tu /
T02D1534:100a-35: aom aa ai ri au li panydza ta th'a ga ta mi bi shuddha sv'a h'a /
T02D1534:100a-37: ri mor bris pa'am 'bur du brkos pa'am gos kyis kyang rung ste /
T02D1534:100a-38: rgyal ba rigs lnga'i bsag nyid can gyi cod pan bskor bar bya'o //
T02D1534:100b-0: @100b 'dis ni phung po lnga dag pa yin la
T02D1534:100b-1: de ltar byang phyogs sku'i sa gzhir chu cod pan
T02D1534:100b-2: gnyis kyis lus dag par byed pa'i dbang yin no
T02D1534:100b-3: // de nas de bzhin du bskor bas lho'i sgor khyer te /
T02D1534:100b-4: shes rab pha rol phyin ma dag par bya ba'i
T02D1534:100b-5: phyir sdar bzhin skye ba'i gnas lnga dag tu dung
T02D1534:100b-6: chos kyi chus aom aa a'a aam ha h'a ha:
T02D1534:100b-7: ho phrem da sha p'a ra mi t'a pa ri
T02D1534:100b-9: zhes bya ba 'dis bsangs la gser ram dul lam
T02D1534:100b-10: dar la sogs pa'i ste dar dpyang bcing bar bya'o
T02D1534:100b-11: // de nas nyi zla dag par bya ba'i phyir sdar bzhin skye ba'i gnas lnga dag tu /
T02D1534:100b-12: aom s'u rya tsandra bi sho dha ka sv'a h'a /
T02D1534:100b-13: zhes bya bas bsangs la rdo rje dril bu snying
T02D1534:100b-14: gar lan gsum bsnol ba sngon du gro bas spyi
T02D1534:100b-16: de ltar lho phyogs gsung gi sa gzhir dag dag pa'i dbang rnam par gnyis so //
T02D1534:100b-17: de nas thugs rdo rje dag par bya ba'i phyir
T02D1534:100b-18: shar sgor khyer te yul dang dbang po dag par
T02D1534:100b-19: bya ba'i phyir sdar bzhin skye ba'i gnas lnga dag
T02D1534:100b-20: tu / aom aa a'a ae aee /
T02D1534:100b-21: aar a'r ao aoo aal a'al bi shyi nri ya bi sho dha ni sv'a h'a /
T02D1534:100b-22: zhes bya bas bsangs la spyi po dang mgrin pa
T02D1534:100b-23: dang rna ba dang dpung ba dang lag pa dang
T02D1534:100b-24: ska rgas dang rkang pa dag tu me tog gi
T02D1534:100b-26: lag par rdo rje'i sor gdub gtad pa ni rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi dbang ngo //
T02D1534:100b-27: de nas nyon mongs pa can gyi yid dag par
T02D1534:100b-28: bya ba'i phyir sngar bzhin skye ba'i gnas lnga dag
T02D1534:100b-29: tu / aom ha h'a ya y'a ra r'a wa
T02D1534:100b-30: w'a la l'a tsa tur brahma bi ha ra bi
T02D1534:100b-31: tu / shuddhe sv'a h'a / zhes bya bas bsangs
T02D1534:100b-32: la sngar gyi me tog lhung ba blangs la spyi
T02D1534:100b-33: tu / shuddhe sv'a h'a / bor gzhag ste /
T02D1534:100b-34: me tog gar babs pa'i rigs dang mthun pa'i ming
T02D1534:100b-36: de ltar brtul zhugs dang ming shar phyogs thugs kyis gzhir sbyin no //
T02D1534:100b-37: de nas nub sgo ye shes sa gzhing [?] khyer te ye shes dag par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1534:100b-38: sngar bzhin skye ba'i gnas lnga dag tu aom ksha dharma tsa kra pra brta ka sv'a h'a /
T02D1534:100b-39: zhes bya bas bsangs la rdo rje dril bu lag gtad te /
T02D1534:100b-40: rnam par dag pa'i lam ston pa'i phyir rjes su gnang ba'i dbang sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1534:101a-0: de nas phyi'i ngag dag pa sngon du @101a * //
T02D1534:101a-1: song bas bum pa dang gsang ba dang shes rab
T02D1534:101a-2: ye shes kyi dbang khyim pa'i phyogs dang rab tu
T02D1534:101a-3: byung ba'i phyogs la rim pa bzhin du'am tshig gis
T02D1534:101a-6: skabs 'dir yang rung ste rigs drug gi dam tshig dang /
T02D1534:101a-7: rtsa ba'i ltung ba la sogs pa'i dam tshig dbog par bya'o //
T02D1534:101a-8: de ltar na rang don gyi dbang rnam pa bcu ste 'jig rten pa'i dbang ngo //
T02D1534:101a-9: 'jig rten las 'das pa ni tha snyad pa dang mtshan nyid ba'i dbye bas gnyis te /
T02D1534:101a-10: tha snyad pa ni khyab bdag rnam ba gsum gyi dbang yin la /
T02D1534:101a-11: mtshan nyid pa ni bsgoms pa las byung ba'i ye
T02D1534:101a-12: shes nang gi byang chub kyi shing drung du thob
T02D1534:101a-14: rgyas par ni bla ma'i man ngag las shes par bya'o //
T02D1534:101a-15: gang phyir dbang gi don la ni /
T02D1534:101a-16: chen po rnams sbyar te me tog 'dzin pa rnams la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02D1534:101a-17: kha cig gsang sngags grub don du //
T02D1534:101a-19: bsod nams 'dod pa de las gzhan //
T02D1534:101a-20: gzhan dag 'jig rten gzhan don gnyer //
T02D1534:101a-21: 'jig rten pha rol don gnyer bar //
T02D1534:101a-22: dad pa mang du byed pa yis //
T02D1534:101a-24: tshe 'di don du gnyer mi bya //
T02D1534:101a-25: tshe 'di don du gnyer ba la //
T02D1534:101a-27: 'jig rten pha rol don gnyer mis //
T02D1534:101a-29: zhes bya bas 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub kyi phyir min gyi /
T02D1534:101a-30: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub kyi phyir bsam pa brtan po la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1534:101a-31: 'khor ba'i dgra las rnam rgyal ba //
T02D1534:101a-32: dpa' chen khyed bdag ston pa bas //
T02D1534:101a-33: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //
T02D1534:101a-34: byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa //
T02D1534:101a-35: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
T02D1534:101a-36: dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol //
T02D1534:101a-37: byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol //
T02D1534:101a-38: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te /
T02D1534:101a-39: skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol //
T02D1534:101a-40: thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu //
T02D1534:101a-41: mgon pos bdag ni 'jug tu gsol //
T02D1534:101a-43: zhes bya ba ni slob ma gzhug pa'o //
T02D1534:101b-0: de nas @101b slob dpon bdag nyid skad cig mas rang snang gi rig ma dang /
T02D1534:101b-1: gnas lnga byin gyis brlab pa byas nas /
T02D1534:101b-2: slob ma rnams zhal nas gzhug pa'i sbyor bas thig le'i rnam par zhu ba dang /
T02D1534:101b-3: lhan cig skyes pa'i mthar yum gyi lhums su spros la /
T02D1534:101b-4: grangs ji snyed pa de snyed kyi h'um gi rnam
T02D1534:101b-5: par bsams la de dag yongs su gyur pa las
T02D1534:101b-6: / phyag gnyis pa'i he ru kar bsams te de
T02D1534:101b-7: nas de dag rdo rje'i lam nas drangs te thugs
T02D1534:101b-8: ka nas phyung la mdun du rang la mngon par
T02D1534:101b-9: phyogs par sna tshogs padma'i gdan re re la 'khod
T02D1534:101b-10: / par bsam mo // de nas de dag la
T02D1534:101b-11: mchod pa lngas mchod la 'di skad ces brjod par
T02D1534:101b-12: / par bsam mo // bya'o // bu tshur theg pa chen po la //
T02D1534:101b-13: khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te //
T02D1534:101b-14: gsang sngags spyod yul cho ga ni //
T02D1534:101b-15: khyod la yang dag bstan par bya //
T02D1534:101b-16: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can //
T02D1534:101b-17: dus gsum byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams //
T02D1534:101b-18: de dag gis kyang gsang sngags kyi //
T02D1534:101b-19: cho ga bzang po 'di mkhyen nas //
T02D1534:101b-20: dpa' bos byang chub shing drung du //
T02D1534:101b-21: thams cad mkhyen pa mtshan med brnyes //
T02D1534:101b-22: gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med de //
T02D1534:101b-23: skyob pa dpal ldan he ru kas //
T02D1534:101b-24: bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa'i //
T02D1534:101b-25: dpung chen dag kyang des bcom ste //
T02D1534:101b-28: de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir //
T02D1534:101b-29: bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig / ces bya ba ni rjes su gnang ba sbyin pa'o //
T02D1534:101b-30: des na sems kyang rmongs pa'i phyir //
T02D1534:101b-31: dam pa'i man ngag la brten nas //
T02D1534:101b-32: dbang gi de nyid gsal bar byas //
T02D1534:101b-33: dpal ldan dang po'i sangs rgyas dang //
T02D1534:101b-34: rdo rje mkha' 'gro gur dang ni //
T02D1534:101b-35: de bzhin sgyu 'phrul dra ba dang //
T02D1534:101b-36: bde mchog la brten lung gi rkyen //
T02D1534:101b-37: grong khyer sumbha ri'i rgyal po'i sras /
T02D1534:101b-38: dpal 'jigs byed lha'i zhal snga nas bstan pa rgyal
T02D1534:101b-39: po seng ge gdan gyi rnam par dag pa'i lam
T02D1534:101b-40: gyi dbang bskur ba'i rab tu bya ba rdzogs so
T02D1534:101b-42: / // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid kyi spyan
T02D1534:101b-43: sngar bod kyi lo ts'a ba sh'akya'i dge slong grags
T02D1534:101b-46: // / log par dad pa'i skye bo rnams //
T02D1534:102a-2: de phyir dbang bskur dam pa 'di //
T02D1534:102a-3: bla ma rje yis bdag la gnang //
T02D1534:102a-4: phyi rabs gdul bya skal ldan mis //
T02D1534:102a-5: bla ma dam pa rtag bsten pas //
T02D1534:102a-6: lam 'di rim gyis bgrod byas te //
